issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: The problem is a duplicate of an existing issue.
resolution.name: Duplicate

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

components.name: Titanium SDK & CLI
components.description: Please enter tickets related to the MobileSDK here.

fields.description:
Hello,

I have created two image views. They rotate clockwise and anti-clock wise with the help of animation. But sometimes the speed of the rotation slows down. And when i start animation, i am getting below waring till i will not stop animation.

New layout set while view [object TiUIImageView] animating: Will relayout after animation.

Please help me to solve this warning.

Thanks
fields.summary: New layout set while view [object TiUIImageView] animating: Will relayout after animation.
